title: Subpart 325-2 - Recommending Of Authorized Physicians By Insurance Carriers And Employers; Procedure For Medical Inspectors And Consultants
content:
Subpart 325-2 - Recommending Of Authorized Physicians By Insurance Carriers And Employers; Procedure For Medical Inspectors And Consultants

State Regulations
§ 325-2.1 - Statement of purpose
§ 325-2.2 - Parties authorized to direct or recommend care of injured workers
§ 325-2.3 - Employer or carrier recommended networks or providers
§ 325-2.4 - Prescribed consent forms
§ 325-2.5 - Waiver agreements related to medical benefits or treatment
§ 325-2.6 - List of authorized physicians
§ 325-2.7 - Repealed
§ 325-2.8 to 325-2.9 - Repealed
§ 325-2.10 - Investigation of complaints

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
